title: lvling bots
body:
riot please fix the problems with the leveling bots because its becoming a big problem because i seem to get grouped up with them all the time and its really annoying   

{{summoner:31}}

replies.body:
I agree that leveling bots are both annoying and a problem for the community. This is why I recommend reporting any account you suspect of being a bot in the post-game lobby. Doing so will allow us to focus our investigations and aid us in removing more of these accounts from the community. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
What would you recommend reporting them as? I usually put using third-party software, then add "Is a bot" in the comment section.

That category works just fine! Perhaps something more along the lines of "I suspect they're botting because <insert reasons here>". I believe this will give us more context should we use the report in an investigation.

I don't know if I'm allowed to post this here, but I had the same bot in 2 of my games. (This is EUW) The account's names is "Richard V4 Neils" (http://www.lolking.net/summoner/euw/88381003#matches) I'll submidt a ticket anyways. If this post of mine is against the rules, feel free to remove it.
